title: Gluten-Free Blueberry Muffins
directions: Preheat oven to 350Â°F. Line 6 cups of a muffin pan.
Combine almond flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl.
Combine coconut milk, egg, honey, and coconut oil in another bowl.
Combine the dry and wet ingredients, and mix until well combined.
Spoon batter into muffin cups, and bake for 20-25 minutes, until golden brown.
Recipe makes 6 muffins. One serving is 2 muffins.
